name: KYNE
tagline: Dedicated to helping improve and save lives.
description:
KYNE's mission is to drive progress against unmet health needs by connecting public and private organizations in strategic partnerships and related communications programming.
We bring together relevant players from government, non-profits, and private companies to address unmet health needs. Our area of expertise is crafting mutually-beneficial, transparent partnerships that improve healthcare.
